features: Neutrogena bottle of dual-phase 100% oil-free liquid eye makeup remover and makeup cleanser formulated with soothing aloe and cucumber for sensitive eyes
Oil-free and non-greasy eye makeup remover formula helps remove all eye makeup, even stubborn waterproof mascara, leaving skin feeling clean and fresh with no heavy residue left behind
For best use, shake liquid makeup remover well to activate and effectively remove all eye makeup when applied to a cotton pad to close eyelids, followed by rinsing face with warm water
This soothing liquid eye makeup remover contains aloe and cucumber extracts to help soothe skin and work gently without the harsh tugging, pulling or stinging of the sensitive eye area or skin
Neutrogena gentle oil-free eye makeup remover is Dermatologist developed and ophthalmologist tested for sensitive eyes and safe for contact lens wearers
body.description: Remove eye makeup in one simple step with Neutrogena Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover. This dermatologist-developed, dual-phase makeup remover and cleanser formula immediately activates when shaken to gently and effectively remove all eye makeup--even waterproof mascara. This eye makeup remover contains aloe and cucumber extracts to help soothe the skin and work gently without the harsh tugging or pulling. The oil-free, non-greasy liquid makeup remover is ophthalmologist tested, so it's safe for contact lens wearers and those with sensitive eyes. It works quickly and won't leave behind greasy residue.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Neutrogena Gentle Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover & Cleanser for Sensitive Eyes, Non-Greasy Makeup Remover Remove eye makeup the right way with this gentle dual phase, oil-free formula. It activates when shaken to gently whisk away eye makeup—even waterproof mascara—without any greasy residue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for less!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always used Estée Lauder eye makeup remover, but for some reason it became hard to get. I thought I’d give this a try in the meantime and boy was I surprised!! It works as well or better as the other one and is a fraction of the cost!! It removes all the shadow and mascara with just a few gentle swipes. I’ll never go back!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my eye make up remover go to!
reviews.reviewText: It easily removes all eye make up in a couple of easy swipes. Does not burn. Does the job with minimum effort!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best eye makeup remover ever
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I use it every single day, dab a little on a cotton pad, let sit on my eye for a few second and wipe away. It is so gentle and so soothing I never have any irritation, no harshness, just perfect for what its supposed to do. The smell is subtle and enjoyable, I really love this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Repeat purchase product for our make up remover
reviews.reviewText: This is a cosmetic that I have been using as a makeup remover (using only for eyes & and lips ) for almost 10 years. It removes makeup very well and, above all, the price is very reasonable compared to any other product. As you know, it is not good to rub the area around your eyes and lips too much, but even a little bit will easily remove your makeup. Also, as you see in the photo, this bottle is larger capacity And it has almost no smell and washes off very gently. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Use daily to remove my makeup. It does it a little oily but I usually wear a makeup pad to remove my makeup

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for many years with no complaints. Takes off waterproof mascara, clean and quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy using this eye makeup remover because it removes my makeup easily and feels good on my skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy on the eyes
reviews.reviewText: Great soft easy removal.. not greasy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Desmaquilla perfecto y no es agresivo para la cara
reviews.reviewText: Tengo la piel súper sensible y todo me irrita, pero este desmaquillante me sirve perfecto. Con poquitito me quita el maquillaje de los ojos y no me irrita nada. Me dura muchísimo así que me parece muy buena relación calidad precio.

reviews.reviewTitle: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Have been unable to find in shops in Singapore. This the same as I would buy in the U.S. Good price and arrived quickly.

Es perfecto cuando por prescripción médica no se puede una desmaquillar los ojos con ningún producto que tenga aceite. Me encanta porque no te reseca la piel y es fácil quitar la máscara de pestañas. No he encontrado otro desmaquillante de ojos tan bueno como este. Muy recomendable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Effective waterproof eye make up remover
reviews.reviewText: A fan for years! Love the oil free formula, no greasy residue and very effective. Great value for money
Lo uso todos los días desde hace tiempo, y retira muy bien todos los rastros del maquillaje.
